main.description: List moderation events related to a subject.

addedLabels.description: If specified, only events where all of these labels were added are returned

addedTags.description: If specified, only events where all of these tags were added are returned

ageAssuranceState.description: If specified, only events where the age assurance state matches the given value are returned

batchId.description: If specified, only events where the batchId matches the given value are returned

collections.description: If specified, only events where the subject belongs to the given collections will be returned. When subjectType is set to 'account', this will be ignored.

comment.description: If specified, only events with comments containing the keyword are returned. Apply || separator to use multiple keywords and match using OR condition.

createdAfter.description: Retrieve events created after a given timestamp

createdBefore.description: Retrieve events created before a given timestamp

hasComment.description: If true, only events with comments are returned

includeAllUserRecords.description: If true, events on all record types (posts, lists, profile etc.) or records from given 'collections' param, owned by the did are returned.

modTool.description: If specified, only events where the modTool name matches any of the given values are returned

items.description: If specified, only events where the action policies match any of the given policies are returned

removedLabels.description: If specified, only events where all of these labels were removed are returned

removedTags.description: If specified, only events where all of these tags were removed are returned

sortDirection.description: Sort direction for the events. Defaults to descending order of created at timestamp.

subjectType.description: If specified, only events where the subject is of the given type (account or record) will be returned. When this is set to 'account' the 'collections' parameter will be ignored. When includeAllUserRecords or subject is set, this will be ignored.

types.description: The types of events (fully qualified string in the format of tools.ozone.moderation.defs#modEvent<name>) to filter by. If not specified, all events are returned.

withStrike.description: If specified, only events where strikeCount value is set are returned.
